title: cant buy things

replies.body:
Yes, the Beta Client has to do with this since this is a bug that only seems to happen in this client. You should be able to resolve this by hopping over to the *Legacy Client* from the login screen to complete your purchase.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Please let me know if this worked for you.
yes it worked, thank you so much :D
